name: Perivolas

reviews.title: Amazing, but not if you like steps
reviews.text: My wife and I just stayed there for our honeymoon, and we had a fantastic time. The pool and view is incredible. The service was very good, and the staff friendly.

reviews.text: The only thing to be concerned about is that the whole hotel is built into a cliff, so there are steps everywhere.
My wife slipped in the room since the bathroom had steps coming out of it, and the surface was wet.
reviews.title: Just divine...
Must have been there at the same time as the previous reviewer
reviews.text: Returned yesterday from one week at Perivolas and today am sorting out flights to return in September. Yes, the "house" was minimalist but a television would have been an intrusion. We found the staff absolutely delightful, always cheerful and nothing was too much trouble. We did have pool service - it was excellent. Our room was kept spotless and even the chair covers on the balcony were changed daily. We have stayed in some extremely posh luxury hotels around the world and if it's in-your-face-luxury you're looking for, then possibly Perivolas is not for you. However, it is a unique experience and certainly the only time we have stayed anywhere for one week but have felt like we've had a 2-week vacation. Absolutely perfect - and my husband is not a cat lover either!

reviews.title: Over hyped - don't believe all you read
reviews.text: We just returned from a 5 day trip to Perivolas. Having read all the publicity and seen 'those' pictures of the pool, we had reasonably high expectations. Especially for the price of Euro 695 / night.

description: The charming and intimate Perivolas Hotel is the ultimate in the relaxed and elegant simplicity of island living. Combining breathtaking views with the luxury of absolute tranquility, beautiful architecture, warm hospitality, excellent cuisine and an inspiring land and seascape.
